## Validation.Validators.oneOf() function

Helper function to create a [Validator](./ts-utils.validation.validator.md) which validates one of several possible validated values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function oneOf<T, TC = unknown>(validators: Array<Validator<T, TC>>, params?: Omit<OneOfValidatorConstructorParams<T, TC>, 'validators'>): OneOfValidator<T, TC>;
```

</td></tr>

**Returns:**

[OneOfValidator](./ts-utils.validation.classes.oneofvalidator.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, TC&gt;

A new [Validator](./ts-utils.validator.md) which validates values that match any of the supplied validators.
